headline: Align Technology Sponsors 30 Invisalign® Treatments Through Smiles4Canada Program to Provide Orthodontic Care to Children and Teens
summary: TEMPE, Ariz., January 13, 2026--Align Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ: ALGN), a leading global medical device company that designs, manufactures, and sells the Invisalign® System of clear aligners, iTero™ intraoral scanners, and exocad™ CAD/CAM software for digital orthodontics and restorative dentistry, today announced a new initiative with the Canadian Foundation for the Advancement of Orthodontics (CFAO). content.title: Align Technology Sponsors 30 Invisalign® Treatments Through Smiles4Canada Program to Provide Orthodontic Care to Children and Teens
content.summary: TEMPE, Ariz., January 13, 2026--Align Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ: ALGN), a leading global medical device company that designs, manufactures, and sells the Invisalign® System of clear aligners, iTero™ intraoral scanners, and exocad™ CAD/CAM software for digital orthodontics and restorative dentistry, today announced a new initiative with the Canadian Foundation for the Advancement of Orthodontics (CFAO). Under this initiative, Align has committed to support Invisalign treatment for 30 eligible pati

thumbnail.caption: Align has committed to support Invisalign® treatment for 30 eligible patients through the Canadian Foundation for the Advancement of Orthodontics (CFAO) Smiles4Canada program.
